definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Marinade during cooking to be a strong, tight package shrimp for tasty.
sentences.chinese: 烹製時滷汁要濃厚，緊包對蝦，以便入味。

sentences.english: Vinegar is not only a tasty flavor can be the first or the human body fitness high quality goods.
sentences.chinese: 醋不僅是調味之首可以入味，還是人體健身佳品。

sentences.english: Mussel crisp delicious, packet sauce tasty, traditional cuisine of coastal Wenzhou.
sentences.chinese: 淡菜脆嫩鮮香，包汁入味，是溫州沿海的傳統佳餚。

sentences.english: Marinating lets the flavor really get absorbed so that they will taste better.
sentences.chinese: 放醬油裏浸泡是爲了將雞翅醃製入味，喫起來更香。

sentences.english: Despite this place being famous for their suckling pig, the roast goose is flavorful inside and out.
sentences.chinese: 這家店雖然以乳豬著稱，燒鵝卻做得十分入味。

sentences.english: Season the steak with salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 將牛肉用鹽和胡椒粉調至入味。

sentences.english: Pork ribs cut into inch long pieces, pickled it to be tasty.
sentences.chinese: 豬的排骨切成寸長小段，將它進行醃漬入味。
